Storz & Bickel BLE Python Library
==================================

A Python library for controlling Storz & Bickel vaporizers (Volcano Hybrid, Venty, and Crafty/Crafty+) via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE).

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   usage
   api
   examples
